hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abdullah said:"I never saw the Messenger of Allah offer any prayer except at the proper time, apart from Maghrib and Isha in Jam (Al-Muzdalifah) and Fajir on that day, which he offered before the usual time

chapter.ara-name: باب الْوَقْتِ الَّذِي يُصَلَّى فِيهِ الصُّبْحُ بِالْمُزْدَلِفَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Time When Subh Is To Be Performed At Al-Muzdalifah
